i live in pittsburgh.

rita hayworth is the woman of my dreams.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Good! I'm doing great, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm just relaxing at home today. What are you up to?
I'm currently working on a project for my class. I'm really excited about it!
Oh that's awesome! What kind of project is it?
It's a video project about Rita Hayworth. I'm a huge fan of hers!
Rita Hayworth? I'm not familiar with her.
She's an amazing actress! She was one of the most popular actresses in Hollywood during the Golden Age.
Oh, I see! I'll have to look her up.
You definitely should! She's so talented! What are your hobbies?
I like to read, play video games, and go for walks.
Oh, those are all great hobbies! I love to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read sci-fi and fantasy novels. I also like to read biographies.
I love sci-fi and fantasy too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, and I also really enjoyed the Lord of the Rings series.
Those are both great series! I'm a big fan of both of them.
Yeah, they're both really well-written.
So, what are you reading right now?
I'm currently reading a book called "The Martian". It's really good so far!
Oh, I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great book.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm glad I met you.
Me too! It was nice talking to you
